ERR_DEP_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE.RECURRING: We could not process your request to book your RD as you have insufficient balance. Please add funds and retry.

FIXED.ERR_DEP_ACCOUNT_CANT_BE_CREDITED: We are unable to close the FD as your account has already exceeded the transaction limit. Please contact the helpdesk for assistance on the same.
